runs.comm: good length on off stump, Tharanga goes back and defends
quicker and moving high and away from outside off stump, rapped on the pads and they steal a leg bye in front of point
banged in short on off stump, Jayasuriya goes for the pull and ends up top-edging over the 'keeper for four
short again on the stumps, not a very quick ball, and Jayasuriya short-arm jabs that nicely over square leg for four, good shot
changes the pace and serves it up a little fuller outside off stump, the ball stays low too and Jayasuriya cant time the cut well at all, misses it
a good length outside off stump, not very quick, and its jabbed to point
full and slow outside off stump, Tharanga stands and just swings the bat at it, missing it all ends up, good start from Franklin
short and wide outside off stump, Tharanga comes down the track, frees the arms, and drives past point out to the deep cover sweeper
thats a wide, too far from Jayasuriya's reach, a freebie
too much width and he cashes in with a nice cut-jab, just dropping the hands on it and placing it in the gap at gully, theres no third man and thats four
too full outside off stump, and Jayasuriya drives that nicely in the gap between cover and mid-off for four more, well done
full on off stump, and he swings that superbly through midwicket or four more, thats three in a row
full outside off stump, he swings the bat at it but fails to make contact
dropped! Fleming placed the short third man for just this chance, and he puts it down! Short and wide, he cuts hard but Franklin lets it through his hands, just in and out, poor stuff
good length delivery angling across outside off, goes after it and misses&
too full and wide outside off stump, he cant even get bat to it, and wide is called, duly
quick on a good length just outside off stump, Jayasuriya pokes at it and gets beaten
slower and fuller outside off stump, Jayasuriya pokes at it and gets an inside edge to leg stump and calls for the run, and it slow getting to the other end and just beats the throw
pitched up outside off, Tharanga drives it to widish mid-off for an easy single
short and wide, slammed over backward point for four
a good length outside off stump, Tharanga slams it out to Ross Taylor on the ropes, who dives well and fields it
comes down the track and goes for the slog, completely misses it
fullish outside off stump, he comes down and slogs it to mid-on
full and wide, slammed high over point for a couple as the ball lands safely
slower delivery, on the legs, Jayasuriya goes for the slof sweep, off the pads to point
good delivery on the stumps, Jayasuriya defends it to mid off
gone! Short and wide, and all he can do is slash it straight to Fleming at a wide gully, who puts the hands up and takes it above his head

dropped! Short and wide, he frees the arms and slashes it over gully, the balls in the air for some time and Taylor moves across from deep cover and cant take it cleanly, the ball was dying on him but he shoudve held onto it, tough but still a chance
glances it to short fine leg for a quick single
change of pace, slower, and all he can do it get a leading edge on the attempted flick that lands safely in front of mid-on
full on middle and leg, and he quickly flicks that with an inside edge down to fine leg
full outside off stump, slogged across the line out to Taylor on the deep midwicket ropes
good length ball on the stumps, defended back to Adams
full outside off stump, and its driven through covers for four
fullish on leg stump, and he just picks it up and sends it over wide long-on for six
full on middle and leg, slammed past mid-on for four more, great stuff!
superb! Short and wide, Jayasuriya hops up and uppercuts it over backward point for four more, and thats his 50 as well, awesome innings!
